scripts.dev: concurrently -n db,api,web -c green,cyan,magenta "npm run db:up" "npm --workspace apps/api run dev" "npm --workspace apps/web run dev"
scripts.db:migrate: docker compose exec -T db psql -U app -d fractional -f /db/migrations/001_init.sql
scripts.db:seed: docker compose exec -T db psql -U app -d fractional -f /db/seed.sql
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
